statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT location_id, speed, congestion_level FROM traffic_data;
SELECT vehicle_type, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE time_stamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, vehicle_type FROM traffic_data ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY time_stamp DESC, speed ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_id, vehicle_type, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level='high' ORDER BY speed DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_id, vehicle_type, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location_id, vehicle_type ORDER BY location_id, max_speed DESC
SELECT time_stamp, location_id, vehicle_type, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50 AND congestion_level='medium' ORDER BY time_stamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(speed) AS avg_speed, congestion_level FROM traffic_data GROUP BY congestion_level ORDER BY avg_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT location, vehicle_count FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT timestamp, traffic_speed FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, vehicle_count, traffic_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_count > 100 AND traffic_speed < 60;
SELECT * FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level = 'High' AND road_condition = 'Heavy Rain';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'City Center' AND vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, vehicle_count FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-10-01' AND vehicle_count < 50 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT timestamp, location, traffic_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_speed BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM congestion_data WHERE road_condition LIKE '%potholes%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT timestamp, location, congestion_level FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT location_name, traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT location_name, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_volume > 100;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level = 'high';
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 ORDER BY congestion_level DESC, location_name ASC
SELECT location_name, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level = 'High'
SELECT AVG(traffic_volume) AS average_traffic_volume, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY congestion_level HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT location_name, traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level IN ('Low','Medium') AND traffic_volume BETWEEN 500 AND 1500
SELECT location_name, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE location_name LIKE '%A%'
SELECT * FROM TrafficStreets;
SELECT street_name, congestion_level FROM TrafficStreets WHERE congestion_level > 2;
SELECT report_description, report_time FROM TrafficReports ORDER BY report_time DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM TrafficUsers WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT street_name, average_speed FROM TrafficStreets WHERE average_speed BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT street_name, average_speed FROM TrafficStreets;
SELECT camera_location, camera_status FROM TrafficCameras WHERE street_id = 5;
SELECT report_description, report_time FROM TrafficReports WHERE camera_id IN (SELECT camera_id FROM TrafficCameras WHERE street_id = 3);
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM TrafficUsers WHERE user_role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT street_name, congestion_level, average_speed FROM TrafficStreets WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY congestion_level DESC, street_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM road_network WHERE road_length > 5;
SELECT road_name, road_length, road_capacity FROM road_network WHERE road_capacity < 100 ORDER BY road_length;
SELECT congestion_id, congestion_level, congestion_timestamp FROM traffic_congestion WHERE congestion_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, location FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT road_name, road_length, road_capacity FROM road_network WHERE road_capacity < 100 ORDER BY road_length ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_congestion WHERE congestion_level = 'high' ORDER BY congestion_timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, location, camera_type FROM traffic_cameras WHERE camera_type = 'speed' ORDER BY location;
